body: "He has won almost every other poetry award he’s eligible for, and this evening in London it was announced that Derek Walcott has won the 2011 T.S. Eliot Prize for his latest book, White Egrets": Caribbean bloggers are thrilled at this latest literary accomplishment.
original_body: "He has won almost every other poetry award he’s eligible for, and this evening in London it was announced that Derek Walcott has won the 2011 T.S. Eliot Prize for his latest book, White Egrets": Caribbean bloggers are thrilled at this latest literary accomplishment.
title: Caribbean: Walcott Wins T.S. Eliot Prize
